Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.cli.graphics

Class GraphicalElement

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.cli.graphics.GraphicalElement
Direct Known Subclasses:
GraphicalCard, GraphicalCloud, GraphicalIsland
public abstract class GraphicalElement extends Object
This class represents the basic information that each element of the CLI has
